column4: Elliott says chipmaker NXP worth 23 percent more than Qualcomm's offer
column5: Activist investor Elliott Management Corp said on Monday NXP Semiconductors NV  is worth about 23 percent more than Qualcomm Inc's  $38-billion offer to buy the chipmaker.

column4: UPDATE 2-Elliott says chipmaker NXP worth 23 pct more than Qualcomm's offer
column5: Dec 11 Activist investor Elliott Management Corp said on Monday NXP Semiconductors NV is worth about 23 percent more than Qualcomm Inc's $38-billion offer to buy the chipmaker.

column4: BRIEF-Qualcomm Responds To Elliott Regarding NXP

column4: BRIEF-Broadcom Files Premerger Notification With U.S. DOJ  FTC Regarding Proposed Acquisition Of Qualcomm
column5: * BROADCOM FILES PRELIMINARY PROXY MATERIALS IN CONNECTION WITH QUALCOMM'S 2018 ANNUAL MEETING AND FILES HART-SCOTT-RODINO NOTIFICATION REGARDING PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF QUALCOMM

column4: Elliott says chipmaker NXP worth more than Qualcomm's offer
column5: Dec 11 Activist investor Elliott Management Corp said on Monday that NXP Semiconductors NV is worth $135 per share on a intrinsic standalone basis  more than the $110 Qualcomm Inc has offered to buy the company.
